author: Jessica Hamzelou
title: World in lockdown as coronavirus cases soar
description: Many countries around the world have put their populations in lockdown as covid-19 cases continue to rise
content:
By Jessica Hamzelou
New York City went into lockdown on Sunday to slow down the virus
Carlo Allegri/Reuters
THE covid-19 pandemic is speeding up, the World Health Organization’s director general has warned. As New Scientist went to press, 382,000 cases of … [+379 chars]
